TypeSignature.Value: public delegate Microsoft.Build.Execution.ProjectInstance ProjectGraph.ProjectInstanceFactoryFunc(string projectPath, Dictionary<string,string> globalProperties, ProjectCollection projectCollection);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed ProjectGraph/ProjectInstanceFactoryFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ProjectGraph.ProjectInstanceFactoryFunc(projectPath As String, globalProperties As Dictionary(Of String, String), projectCollection As ProjectCollection) As ProjectInstance

public: delegate Microsoft::Build::Execution::ProjectInstance ^ ProjectGraph::ProjectInstanceFactoryFunc(System::String ^ projectPath, Dictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ globalProperties, ProjectCollection ^ projectCollection);
type ProjectGraph.ProjectInstanceFactoryFunc = delegate of string * Dictionary<string, string> * ProjectCollection -> ProjectInstance

param.name: projectPath
param.span: 要分析的项目文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the project file to parse.

param.name: globalProperties
param.span: 用于创建 ProjectInstance 的全局属性。

span.span: The global properties to be used for creating the ProjectInstance.

param.name: projectCollection
param.span: 用于分析过程的 上下文。

summary.span: 用于为特定 实例构造 的回调。

span.span: A callback used for constructing a for a specific instance.
This value must not be null.

remarks.span: ProjectGraph 使用的此委托的默认版本只是使用来自参数的信息调用 ProjectInstance 构造函数。

span.span: The default version of this delegate used by ProjectGraph simply calls the ProjectInstance constructor with information from the parameters.

remarks.span: 此委托作为挂钩提供，允许在将 实例转换为 ProjectInstance 以供 ProjectGraph 使用之前创建实例。

span.span: This delegate is provided as a hook to allow scenarios like creating a instance before converting it to a ProjectInstance for use by the ProjectGraph.

remarks.span: 返回的 ProjectInstance 将存储并随 ProjectGraph 一起提供。

span.span: The returned ProjectInstance will be stored and provided with the ProjectGraph.

remarks.span: 如果此回调选择生成不可变的 ProjectInstance，例如通过使用 with 标志 ，则生成的 ProjectGraph 节点可能不是可生成。

span.span: If this callback chooses to generate an immutable ProjectInstance, e.g. by using with the flag , the resulting ProjectGraph nodes might not be buildable.

remarks.span: 为避免损坏关系图以及基于关系图的后续生成：-必须使用所有回调参数创建 ProjectInstance，而不是任何突变-不应以任何方式转变项目实例，其状态应为项目文件的完全保真表示形式。

span.span: To avoid corruption of the graph and subsequent builds based on the graph: - all callback parameters must be utilized for creating the ProjectInstance, without any mutations - the project instance should not be mutated in any way, its state should be a full fidelity representation of the project file
